segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on drying that plate, it's almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even flinch as the water spills over her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel his determination to reach the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is patiently waiting, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's hoping to get a cookie without their mom noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water is creating a large puddle on the floor, making it slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden looks so serene and well-maintained.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame the inside of the house isn't as orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the mess or the children's antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like watching a scene from a silent movie, full of physical comedy.
segments.speaker: PAR
